content: indulge in the art of crochet with our ball of ladders shawl pattern this mesmerizing design combines intricate eyelets and seamless construction to create a stunning triangular wrap that will elevate any outfit whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out this easy-level pattern offers a rewarding project that showcases your skills with detailed written instructions and video tutorials you ll breeze through each row and watch your shawl come to life crafted with lion brand s shawl in a ball yarn this aran-weight beauty drapes elegantly and offers a cozy warmth perfect for any season embrace the joy of creating with our ball of ladders pattern and add a touch of handmade charm to your wardrobe **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels seamless construction for a polished finish intricate eyelet design adds texture and visual interest detailed written instructions and video tutorials for guidance made with luxurious shawl in a ball yarn for a soft and cozy feel **materials needed-** yarn lion brand shawl in a ball aran weight 8 wpi - 400-480 yards hook 6mm us size 10 0 gauge 14 stitches by 7 row = 4 inches in double_crochet
